title: Message from Poseidon
content: Hey there! How would you like a vacation in Hawai, I can teach you the joys of surfing

title: Message from Athena
content: I just found a cool new Book! Let me know if you want to check it out together.

title: Message from Hestia
content: I am here because when all else fails, when all the other mighty gods have gone off to war, I am all that's left. Home. Hearth. I am the last Olympian
